src/lib/components/Wordcloud.react.js.description:
Wordcloud is used to render a cloud of words using the react-wordcloud component
by chrisrzhou:
https://github.com/chrisrzhou/react-wordcloud

words.description:
An array of words.
A word is an object that must contain the ‘text’ and ‘value’ keys.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

maxWords.description: Maximum number of words to display

minSize.description: Set minimum [width, height] values for the SVG container.

size.description:
Set explicit [width, height] values for the SVG container.
This will disable responsive resizing.
If undefined, the wordcloud will responsively size to its parent container.

options.description: Configure the wordcloud with various options.
